mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (member_id, broker_id, start_time, end_time, client_memo, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{reservation.memberId}, #{reservation.brokerId}, #{reservation.startTime}, #{reservation.endTime}, #{reservation.clientMemo}, #{reservation.status}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET start_time = #{reservation.startTime}, end_time = #{reservation.endTime}, client_memo = #{reservation.clientMemo}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE rid = #{reservation.rid}
mapper.select: SELECT rid, member_id AS memberId, broker_id AS brokerId, start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime, status, client_memo AS clientMemo, broker_memo AS brokerMemo, broker_name AS brokerName, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM reservation WHERE rid = #{rid}
